Class ImageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.perfeng.uiperf.imageoptimization.utils.ImageUtils

  • public class ImageUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods used to interact with images.
    Since:
    186.internal
    Author:
    eperret (Eric Perret)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.lang.String CONVERT_BINARY
      Name of Image Magic's "convert" binary application used to convert one image into another image by changing it's file type.

    • Field Detail

      • CONVERT_BINARY

        static final java.lang.String CONVERT_BINARY
        Name of Image Magic's "convert" binary application used to convert one image into another image by changing it's file type. This application needs to be installed on the system this JAVA app is running on.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageUtils

        public ImageUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getBufferedImage

        static final java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBufferedImage(java.io.File file)
        Gets the BufferedImage from the passed in File.
        Parameters:
        file - The File to use.
        Returns:
        The resulting BufferedImage

      • visuallyCompare

        public static final boolean visuallyCompare(java.io.File file1,
                      java.io.File file2)
        Compares file1 to file2 to see if they are the same based on a visual pixel by pixel comparison. This has issues with marking images different when they are not. Works perfectly for all images.
        Parameters:
        file1 - Image 1 to compare
        file2 - Image 2 to compare
        Returns:
        true if both images are visually the same.

      • containsAlphaTransparency

        public static final boolean containsAlphaTransparency(java.io.File file)
        Parameters:
        file - The image to check
        Returns:
        true if the image contains one or more pixels with some percentage of transparency (Alpha)

      • convertImageNative

        public static final void convertImageNative(java.io.File fromImage,
                      java.io.File toImage)
                                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                            ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException
        Converts an image from one format to another format using Image Magic's "convert" binary. This works better than what JAVA has built in.
        Parameters:
        fromImage - The starting image.
        toImage - The ending (converted) image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Happens in the application is being rude.
        ThirdPartyBinaryNotFoundException - Thrown if the "convert" application does not exist.

      • isAminatedGif

        public static final boolean isAminatedGif(java.io.File file)
        Checks to see if the image is an animated gif.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to check
        Returns:
        true if it is an animated gif.
